resume_text:
Abhishek Jha
♂phone6289716964 |/envel⌢pejhaa213152@gmail.com |/linkedinlinkedin.com/abhishek |/githubgithub.com/abhishek |/codeleetcode.com/abhishek

Shree Jain Vidyalaya kolkata
Higher Secondary Education Apr 2021
Hind Motor High School kolkata
Secondary Education Mar 2019
Experience
Twowaits Technologies March 2024 – May 2024
Technical Content Writer Remote
•Conceptualized comprehensive technical content on Data Structures and Algorithms concepts.
•Created dry run pictorial examples to clarify concepts, using different shapes, canvas, and related tools for visual
representation.
•Collaborated with technical writers, editors, and subject matter experts to ensure the accuracy, consistency, and
quality of all written materials.
Projects
Laundry Utility |React Native, React, Express, Firebase, Redux ♂share-square June 2024 – August 2024
•Developed a laundry service platform with payment integration using React Native for the mobile app and React.js
for the website, featuring item selection, address input, date and time scheduling with real-time validation
•Implemented Firebase for authentication and Express for a robust backend
•Used Redux Toolkit for efficient state management and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive, modern UI that
enhances usability and visual appeal
Youtube Sentiment Analysis |Flask, Youtube Data API, React, VADER Library ♂share-square Dec 2023 – Mar 2024
•Implemented a sentiment analysis on YouTube video comments, where users enter a video URL to receive an
analysis of the total number of comments, including positive and negative comments
•Used VADER sentiment analysis to evaluate YouTube comments with 90% accuracy, providing sentiment insights
via the YouTube API
•Built a robust backend using Flask and React.js for the frontend
Background Removerl |React, Removebg API ♂share-square Apr 2023 – June 2023
•Developed a user-friendly React.js interface for automated image background removal, focusing on reusable
components and a robust design, achieving a 90% reduction in background removal errors
•Showcased frontend development and API integration skills with DOM manipulation and React hooks, enhancing
UI engagement and increasing user retention rates by 25%
Skills
Programming : Java, SQL, JavaScript, Python
Development : React Js, React Native, HTML, CSS, Express.js, Firebase, Tailwind CSS
CS Fundamentals : Data Structure & Algorithms, Object Oriented Programming, DBMS, Computer Networks
Accomplishments
Scored 3325 rank out of 34697 in biweekly contest 135.
Solved more than 500 questions on various coding platforms.
Interest & Hobbies
Video Editing
Reading
Cricket

conversation.content:
Hello Abhishek, good to meet you.  Thanks for coming in.

Your resume shows experience with React Native. Can you tell me about a challenge you faced while building the Laundry Utility app using React Native?

technicalSkills.assessment: Abhishek demonstrates familiarity with React Native, React, Express, Firebase, and Redux, as evidenced by his Laundry Utility app. However, the interview only elicited a brief mention of the project and no specific challenges faced.  A more in-depth discussion of technical hurdles, solutions implemented, and lessons learned would have provided a more comprehensive evaluation of his technical proficiency. His resume indicates a budding understanding of Data Structures and Algorithms through his content writing role, but further assessment is needed to evaluate his practical application of these concepts.

communicationSkills.assessment: Based on the limited transcript, Abhishek's communication style appears to be concise.  However, a more substantial conversation would be needed to fully evaluate his clarity, articulation, and ability to explain complex technical concepts in a straightforward manner.  His resume writing (with symbols representing phone, email etc.) appears unprofessional, indicating possible room for improvement in written communication.

problemSolvingAbilities.assessment: This aspect cannot be accurately assessed based solely on the provided information.  The interview question about challenges faced in the Laundry Utility app was not answered in detail.  To evaluate problem-solving skills, it would be crucial to delve into specific technical problems, his approach to solving them, and the outcomes.

culturalFit.assessment: Not enough information is available to assess cultural fit.  Further interaction is required to determine his teamwork abilities, work ethic, and alignment with the company culture.

strengths: Familiarity with React Native, React, Express, Firebase, and Redux.
Experience in technical content writing, demonstrating an ability to understand and explain complex technical topics.
weaknesses: Lack of detailed response to technical challenge questions, hindering the assessment of his problem-solving and in-depth technical expertise.
Resume formatting issues suggest a need to improve professional communication skills.
Limited demonstration of the ability to articulate technical details clearly.
assessment.overallImpression: Abhishek shows promise, particularly in his familiarity with modern web development technologies. However, the interview was too brief to fully evaluate his technical skills and problem-solving abilities. A more in-depth technical discussion is necessary to make a confident hiring decision.
recommendationsForImprovement: Practice articulating technical challenges and solutions encountered during project development.
Develop the ability to explain complex concepts clearly and concisely.
Improve resume formatting to present a more professional image.
Expand on projects in the resume to showcase more technical details and highlight problem-solving abilities.
Consider adding personal projects to demonstrate initiative and further showcase skills.
